name: maduchat-frontend
description: This is the frontend of MaduChat. More information here: https://github.com/Madu-de/MaduChat/tree/main/frontend
author: Madu
license: GNU Affero General Public License v3.0

scripts.package:win: npm run build-electron && cross-var electron-packager dist/frontend $npm_package_name-$npm_package_version --out=dist/packages --platform=win32 --arch=all --overwrite && npm run delete-dist-frontend
scripts.package:linux: npm run build-electron && cross-var electron-packager dist/frontend $npm_package_name-$npm_package_version --out=dist/packages --platform=linux --arch=all --overwrite && npm run delete-dist-frontend
scripts.package:win-lux: npm run build-electron && cross-var electron-packager dist/frontend $npm_package_name-$npm_package_version --out=dist/packages --platform=win32,linux --arch=all --overwrite && npm run delete-dist-frontend
scripts.package:osx: npm run build-electron && cross-var electron-packager dist/frontend $npm_package_name-$npm_package_version --out=dist/packages --platform=darwin --arch=all --overwrite && npm run delete-dist-frontend
scripts.package:all: npm run build-electron && cross-var electron-packager dist/frontend $npm_package_name-$npm_package_version --out=dist/packages --all --arch=all --overwrite --symlinks && npm run delete-dist-frontend
scripts.build+win: npm run package:win && npm run build
scripts.build+linux: npm run package:linux && npm run build
scripts.build+win-lux: npm run package:win-lux && npm run build
scripts.build+osx: npm run package:osx && npm run build
scripts.build+all: npm run package:all && npm run build
